title: Input schema for Tiktok scraper
description: Get data from the first page for Tik-tok hashtag search

startURLs.title: Start URLs
startURLs.description: List of URLs that will be scraped or crawled. Can be a tag or channel/user url. No support for search urls.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy. But you can also use your own proxies or no proxy
